DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate two routinely use drug combination periarticular injection follow total hip arthroplasty pain control . One group receive liposomal bupivacaine , bupivacaine , clonidine , epinephrine ketorolac . The group receive ropivacaine , clonidine , epinephrine ketorolac .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial Two Periarticular Multimodal Drug Injections Total Hip Arthroplasty
DOC.criteria: Hip Arthritis ( osteoarthritis , post traumatic , inflammatory , avascular necrosis ) Current use opioid drug Revision surgery Surgical complication ( femoral fracture implant insertion ) Inability provide Informed Consent
